name: database
description: A comprehensive school database used to manage student and department information.

tables.name: students
tables.description: This table stores comprehensive details about each student enrolled in the school. It includes identifiers, personal details, academic status, and departmental affiliations.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each student, typically an auto-incrementing integer.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Full legal name of the student as recorded in school records.

columns.name: age
columns.description: The student's age, recorded in whole years, used for demographic and eligibility purposes.

columns.name: gmail
columns.description: The studentâ€™s primary email address for official school communication.

columns.name: dep_id
columns.description: Foreign key linking to the 'departments' table. Identifies the academic department the student is enrolled in.

tables.name: departments
tables.description: This table maintains a list of all academic departments within the school. Each department represents a specific field of study or administrative division.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each department, typically an auto-incrementing integer.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The official name of the academic department, e.g., 'Mathematics', 'Physics', 'Literature'.
